name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro
description: Xiaomi Redmi Note 11 Pro will be launched in 2021, November. The Redmi Note 11 Pro (China) was launched with the model number unknown. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 8.3 mm and the weight is 207 grams. Secondly, the Redmi Note 11 Pro (China) display is a 6.67-inch AMOLED panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 920 5G (6 nm) and running with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (2x2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 6x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU.
